Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add police simulation game with incident and vehicle management

Features implemented:
- Auto-cleanup for failed incidents (30s) and completed incidents (60s)
- Incident filter system (All, Active, Completed, Failed)
- Vehicle status filter system (All, S1-S8)
- Unified and minimalistic filter button design
- Dynamic route colors based on vehicle status
- Route visibility only on hover
- Priority-based status indicators with pulsing animations
- Realistic sound system with PTT and sirens
- MANV (mass casualty) incident support
- Vehicle refueling and maintenance system
- Weather system with dynamic conditions
- Pause overlay with glassmorphism effect
- Protocol logging and radio communication
- LST-SIM style UI with modern design
